EmailTemplate.name: Approve Trade In Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Please review and action this Trade-In ERP!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The following Trade-In ERP has been appraised by the shop and has been determined that additional work is required. This ERP is currently pending Sales Manager approval. Please review the details provided on the ERP Order Tasks. The Trade-In ERP can be reviewed by clicking the following URL:
{!AcctSeed__Project__c.Link}
